Name: BAD BILLY 2D VR
About the game: Billy is really angry! Billy's girlfriend Jessica was kidnapped by creatures from a 2D World. Billy has to follow the creatures into the 2D World to free Jessica. 5 Levels VR Jump and Run in 2D Style 5 Achievements
